titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on propanoic acid, 2-[4-[(5-chloro-3-fluoro-2-pyridinyl)oxy]-phenoxy]-2- propynyl ester.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/15/2000--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2003, the duty on a specified chemical.
